thawath athakata yamkisi prajawak, yam kisi jana kotasak ekata bandala thabana adahili wishwasa, bhashawa, aagama, jiwathwana widiha, kanabona widiha, nishpadana kriyawaliya wage wadagath sanskruthika kotas ithamath prayojanawath wenawa prajawak ekata bandala thabanna.

mathakaye radunu anikuth suwisheshi mansalakuna wuwe "muthuhara" sangarawayi.liya penwiya nohaki tharam danum sambharayak muthuhara thulin labagathimi.1993 sita ehen mehen kiyawu muthuhara piliwelakata miladi ganu labuwe 1996 sitaya.chandrika palana samaye sande lidar samagamata ella wu deshapalana balapam nisa kalayak muthuhara mudranaya natharawi thibuni.nawatha mudranaya aarmbhakalath ethan sita muthuhara penwuwe wala kara yana gamanaki.warthamanaye muthuhara sangarawata athwi athi iranama shoka janaka wi atha.etharam danum sambharayak labadun muthuhara dan montisori pothak bawata pathwi atha.eheth ema aduwa pirawimata berewawen mudranaya karana "danamuthu" samath wi atha.muthuhara sarthaka yugayanhi kathuwaraya wu kumara siriwardhana wisin pradhana kathuwara dhuraya usulana danamuthu ekala muthuhara menma katussage manadola pinawimata samath wi atha.
nuthana rajyayanhi ha eewaye aandukrama sampradayayangeda pawathma kerehi eewa godanagena aithihasika watapitawa, eewa thana ganna wishesha swabhawaya ha eewa nadaththu kerena aakarayada balapayi.
